person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Tampico port authorities said fishing restrictions were in place in an area adjacent to the port because of a geophysical study being carried out in deep waters of the region from the ship Kenda .

Let's think step by step.

| Person     |
|------------|
| port authorities |
| ship Kenda |

Even though "port authorities" is a group of people, I have included it as a "Person" entity because it is a common practice in Named Entity Recognition to consider such collective nouns as entities.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person     |
|------------|
| port authorities |

The ship Kenda is not considered a "Person" entity, so I have removed it from the list. Only "port authorities" remains as a valid "Person" entity.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Tampico port authorities said fishing restrictions were in place in an area adjacent to the port because of a geophysical study being carried out in deep waters of the region from the ship Kenda .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Tampico port authorities |
| port Kenda |

In the given paragraph, there are two organization entities: "Tampico port authorities" and "port Kenda". The first one is a group or department that manages the port of Tampico, while the second one seems to be a vessel or ship named "Kenda" which is associated with a port, making it an organization in this context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Organization" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Tampico port authorities |

In the given paragraph, there is only one clear organization entity: "Tampico port authorities". The other entity, "port Kenda", is not a clear organization as it seems to be a vessel or ship associated with a port, but it does not necessarily mean it is an organization.
